1.description: /played displays how long you have played this character for

2.description: /age displays how long ago you created this character

3.description: /remaining displays the number of monsters remaining in the area

4.description: /deaths displays how many deaths you have incurred

6.description: /ladder shows the top ten characters on the current ladder

8.description: /destroy destroys the item on your cursor (be careful!)

9.description: /whois displays some information about a character by name

11.description: /itemlevel displays the level of an item on your cursor

13.description: /bug reports a bug and gives you the report reference number

15.description: /ignore ignores an account by character name

17.description: /unignore stops ignoring an account by character name

19.description: /clear_ignore_list removes all accounts from your ignore list

21.description: /passives displays a breakdown of your passive skill points

22.description: /invite invites someone to your party by name

23.description: /friend adds a friend to your list by name

33.description: /autoreply [message] Autoreply to whispers with a custom message.

34.description: /afk [message] Autoreply to whispers that you are AFK. Performing any action, including chatting, will cancel AFK mode.

35.description: /dnd [message] Autoreply to whispers that you are DND and ignore all incoming messages.

38.description: /spectate Begins PvP spectating the specified character. Use /town to return.

40.description: /abandon_daily will close the current daily mission portal in your Hideout.

41.description: /global X changes to global chat channel X.

42.description: /trade X changes to trade chat channel X.

43.description: /recheck_achievements Forces a recheck of certain achievements

45.description: /reset_xp Resets your experience per hour calculation.
